akamaiMediaAnalytics.label: Akamai Media Analytics
akamaiMediaAnalytics.description: Supports sending player analytics events to Akamai.

securedConfigPath.doc: Secured URL for Akamai's configuration XML.
securedConfigPath.label: Secured configuration XML path

swfPath.doc: URL for Akamai Media Analytics SWF.
swfPath.label: Media Analytics SWF path

securedSwfPath.doc: Secured URL for Akamai Media Analytics SWF.
securedSwfPath.label: Secured Media Analytics SWF path

trackEventMonitor.doc: Track Akamai media analytics events with a named callback.

playerId.doc: Override the default value for the playerId field, By default it is the uiconf_id.

title.doc: Override the default value for the title field. By default it is the entry ID.

category.doc: Override the default value for the category field, By default it is the media type. For example, image, video, audio.

subCategory.doc: Override the default value for the subCategory field. The default value is null. This field can be used for additional segmentation.

eventName.doc: Override the default value for the eventName field, custom set by event

show.doc: To set the show attribute sent with events

viewerId.doc: To set the viewerId attribute sent with events

contentType.doc: To set the contentType attribute sent with events
